us.aaronweiss.juicebot

Class AutoBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.aaronweiss.juicebot.Bot
      • us.aaronweiss.juicebot.AutoBot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ManagedBot, MetalGear

    public abstract class AutoBot
extends Bot
    A basic bot that auto-rejoins upon being kicked, and attempts to avert poor bans. n.b. You must call super.receive(...) when you extend it in order to receive desired functionality.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Aaron Weiss
